revised_title: Observations of the Total Solar Eclipse of 1898, January 22: Preliminary Report on the Observations Made at Pulgaon, India
tldr: The authors report on their observations and findings during the total solar eclipse of January 22, 1898, in Pulgaon, India. They detail the preparations, instruments used, and the observing party, as well as meteorological and magnetic field observations made during the event.
